item.description: All video games are captive to the constraints of technology. But sometimes human ingenuity and art can creatively circumvent reality‚Äôs would-be limitations, resulting in something unexpected ‚Äî except...
item.content:encoded: All video games are captive to the constraints of technology. But sometimes human ingenuity and art can creatively circumvent reality‚Äôs would-be limitations, resulting in something unexpected ‚Äî except to those who worked tirelessly to make it possible. It‚Äôs difficult to imagine Silent Hill without its spooky, ominous fog, or Crash Bandicoot without crates to smash, […]
